member.name: M:Minesweeper.MinesweeperGridModule.generate(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a minesweeper grid with a given RNG, width, height, mine count, and starting position.
member.remarks: The width and the height cannot be less than 5 The mine count must be between 1 and the width * height - 1 The x value must be between 0 and the width - 1 The y value must be between 0 and the height - 1 Does not uncover the first square, must call `MinesweeperGrid.uncover` separately.

member.summary: Verfies that a minesweeper grid with, width, height, mine count, is possible.
member.remarks: The width and the height cannot be less than 5 The mine count must be between 1 and the width * height - 1 The x value must be between 0 and the width - 1 The y value must be between 0 and the height - 1
